Downed Northland pylon: Transpower manager says context missing from failures announcement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/downed-pylon-transpower-grid-manager-says-context-missing-from-announcement/WUI3TT637ZCV3LBBN7RDRRPN3I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/downed-pylon-transpower-grid-manager-says-context-missing-from-announcement/WUI3TT637ZCV3LBBN7RDRRPN3I/ Sarah CurtisTranspower says its position in the fallen pylon incident has not been fairly represented Sun, 29 Sep 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Transpower executive general manager of grid delivery Mark Ryall during a press conference at Whangārei District Council the day after a pylon collapsed near Gloravit leaving 88,000 electricity customers in Northland without power. Photo / NZME
